Quest_agentNote.description: A rain-soaked note belonging to the stallion in a raincoat. The letters are clearly legible.

submachine10.description: Submachine gun for large caliber cartridges with appropriate recoil

stealthArmor.description: Combination on light armor, bandage, headrope and cute stealth-socks guarantees the safety.

privateUniform.description: Equestrian army private uniform. Seems like something is missing...

schoolUniform.description: You don't want to wear it at all

powerArmor.description: Developed my MWT, turns earthponies to a walking tanks. Needs nuclear battery to work.

antiradio.description: Better to look stupid than to be a radioactive stiff

bowRibbon.name: Bow
bowRibbon.description: It does not have any properties, it is cheap. But it looks nice с:

collar.name: Collar
collar.description: Uncomfortable metal collar, strongly chafing the neck. I can't take it off without a key.

maffin.name: Maffin
maffin.description: Who wouldn't want a piece of something sweet?

pie.name: Apple Pie
pie.description: A masterpiece of culinary apple art

healPotion.name: Heal potion
healPotion.description: One of the most useful items for every pony since the declaration of war on zebras

manaPotion.description: Very useful for unicorns potion, that increases their magical abilities.

buck.name: Buck
buck.description: Pills, that temporarily increase strength and endurance. May cause addiction

dash.name: Dash
dash.description: Inhaler, that increases reaction speed. May cause addiction

hydra.name: Hydra
hydra.description: Increases cell regeneration. Some time after use, food may not restore health

medX.name: Med-X
medX.description: Intravenous painkiller. Temporarily removes the feeling of pain and reduces the damage received. May cause addiction

rage.name: Rage
rage.description: Intravenous drug, that increases aggression level. May cause addiction

mentats.name: Mentats
mentats.description: Adds color to the world and make you feel smarter than you really are. May cause addiction

stealthBuck.name: Stealth Buck
stealthBuck.description: A device developed on the basis of Zebra technologies that generates a stealth field when using (prototype)
